dataList.name: The Prescript's Target - The Index
dataList.desc: Skill Power -2 against and take +20% damage from The Index enemies

dataList.name: Grace of the Prescript
dataList.desc:
- Offense Level +1 for every 3 Stack
- Max Stack: 9

dataList.name: Prescript
dataList.desc: Receive Prescript: [Device] under specific conditions
dataList.flavor: The Prescripts are delivered by many means, their medium determined with finality akin to divine prophecy. Those who receive them hold no power over how they arrive.

dataList.name: Prescript: [Device] I
dataList.desc:
Attack and hit a Prescript's Target.

- Turn Start: Gain this effect when this unit has no Unlock
- Maximum stackable Grace of the Prescript with this Prescript is limited to 3
dataList.flavor: The Prescripts are delivered by many means, their medium determined with finality akin to divine prophecy. Those who receive them hold no power over how they arrive.

dataList.name: Prescript: [Device] II
dataList.desc:
Hit a Prescript's Target with the Skill equipped in the first Slot, or eliminate a random target.

- Turn Start: Gain this effect if this unit has Unlock - I
- Maximum stackable Grace of the Prescript with this Prescript is limited to 6
dataList.flavor: The Prescripts are delivered by many means, their medium determined with finality akin to divine prophecy. Those who receive them hold no power over how they arrive.

dataList.name: Prescript: [Device] III
dataList.desc:
Stagger or eliminate a random target.

- Turn Start: Gain this effect if this unit has Unlock - II
- Maximum stackable Grace of the Prescript with this Prescript is limited to 9
dataList.flavor: The Prescripts are delivered by many means, their medium determined with finality akin to divine prophecy. Those who receive them hold no power over how they arrive.

dataList.name: Prescript: [Device] IV
dataList.desc:
Eliminate all obstacles before the next Prescript arrives.

- Turn Start: Gain this effect if this unit has Unlock - III
dataList.flavor: The Prescripts are delivered by many means, their medium determined with finality akin to divine prophecy. Those who receive them hold no power over how they arrive.

dataList.name: Unlock - I
dataList.desc:
- Offense Level +1, Defense Level +1
- Combat End: Heal 15 SP

dataList.name: Unlock - II
dataList.desc:
- Offense Level +2, Defense Level +2
- Combat End: Heal 30 SP

dataList.name: Unlock - III
dataList.desc:
- Offense Level +3, Defense Level +3
- Combat End: Heal 45 SP

dataList.name: Karmic Consequence
dataList.desc:
- Turn Start:
· Gain 1 Defense Level Down for every 10 Stacks
· Gain 1 Fragile for every 20 Stacks
- Max Stack: 100
dataList.flavor: Receive the Prescript and undertake it. Its execution is etched as karma, drawn into a ceaseless cycle that circles back to the hand of its executor.

dataList.name: Faith Beyond Question
dataList.desc:
- Min & Max Speed +1
- Offense Level +3, Defense Level +3
- Gain +1 more Poise Potency from Skills
dataList.flavor: "Isn't... Isn't it self-evident? Each word that the beeper grants is unquestionably... b-beyond question."

dataList.name: Shin (心) - Sora
dataList.desc:
- Min & Max Speed +1
- Offense Level +2, Defense Level +2
- Gain +1 more Poise Potency and Poise Count from Skills
- Deal +(missing HP percentage + 25)% damage (max 100%)

dataList.name: Onus
dataList.desc:
- Deal +25% damage for every Stack (max 50%)
- Under Effloresced E.G.O::Procuration state:
· At 1 Stack, Final Power +1
· At 2 Stack, Final Power +3 instead
- Max Stack: 2
dataList.flavor: 'W-what should I do? What is unquestionable must be carried out unquestionably...'

dataList.name: Extreme Onus
dataList.desc:
- Deal +50% damage for every Stack (max 100%)
- Under Effloresced E.G.O::Procuration state:
· At 1 Stack, Final Power +2
· At 2 Stack, Plus Coin Power +1 and Final Power +3 instead
- Max Stack: 2
- When using certain Skills, counts as Onus and is consumed

dataList.name: Prescript Incompliance Risk
dataList.desc:
- Low Morale
- Deal +20% damage to targets that have The Prescript's Target
- Take +10% damage from targets that do not have The Prescript's Target

dataList.name: Prescript Incompliance Risk
dataList.desc:
- Panic
- Deal +30% damage to targets that have The Prescript's Target
- Take +20% damage from targets that do not have The Prescript's Target

dataList.name: The Yellow Harpoon
dataList.desc:
- Turn Start: Gain 2 Haste and 8 Poise
- Turn End: Gain +3 Poise Count if an enemy has Nested Harpoon

dataList.name: Shin(心) - The Yellow Harpoon
dataList.desc:
- Base Offense Level +3, Base Defense Level +3
- Heal 3 SP when attacking target that attacked this unit last turn
- At 0+ SP, gain Final Power by (SP / 10) (rounded down)

dataList.name: Nested Harpoon [Beesting]
dataList.desc:
- Slash Resist. +0.2, Sloth Resist. +0.2
- Turn End: Gain 2 Bind next turn
- On Hit: Gain 1 Bleed Potency
- When attacked by Vespa, gain 2 Gungnir's Droning
- Activate Bleed on this unit once when this effect is removed

dataList.name: Nested Harpoon [Waspsting]
dataList.desc:
- Slash Resist. +1, Sloth Resist. +1
- Turn End: Gain 4 Bind next turn
- On Hit: Gain 3 Bleed Potency
- When attacked by Vespa, gain 3 Gungnir's Droning
- Activate Bleed on this unit 2 times when this effect is removed

dataList.name: Gungnir's Droning
dataList.desc:
- When attacked by Vespa, take fixed damage equal to this effect's Potency
- Reduce Count by 1 after Turn End (Interacts the same way as normal Tremor does to effects that raise Tremor Count)
dataList.flavor: <color=#fde55d>Those impaled by the harpoon are pulverized as successive strikes amplify its vibrating force.</color>

dataList.name: Apic Flashburst Blade Art - Hwando
dataList.desc: Deal +10% more damage on Critical Hit for every Stack this turn
dataList.flavor:
<color=#fde55d>A swordfighting style originating from the East, suited to those who employ instantaneous bursts of leaping movement that verge on teleportation.

The boy braved the life-threatening augmentation with a desperate resolve, and his survival proved his worth.</color>

dataList.name: Vexation
dataList.desc:
- Low Morale
- Gain 1 Pierce Power Up and 1 SP Heal Efficiency Down

dataList.name: Vexation
dataList.desc:
- Panic
- Gain 2 Pierce Power Up, 1 Pierce DMG Up, and 2 SP Heal Efficiency Down

dataList.name: Affection and Resentment
dataList.desc: Deal +10% damage to and take +10% damage from Ryōshū

dataList.name: Affection and Resentment
dataList.desc: Deal +20% damage to and take +20% damage from Ryōshū

dataList.name: Bladetrail [Afterimage]
dataList.desc:
- Max Stack: 99
- Turn Start: Gain 1 Fragile for every 10 Stack (max 5)

dataList.name: Dihui Star's Blade
dataList.desc: - Total sum of Bladetrail [Afterimage] Stack in this Encounter

dataList.name: Silent Regard
dataList.desc: UNUSED BUFF

dataList.name: Disjunction
dataList.desc:
- Turn Start: The Part gains Shield equal to Stack
- Reduction in the Shield reduces the Stack as well

dataList.name: Fourfold Afterimage Entanglement
dataList.desc:
Stage 4 Afterimage Entanglement
- Min & Max Speed -2 for this unit
- On Hit, activate the following effects:
  · Inflict 1 Poison
  · Inflict 2 Bleed
  · Inflict 1 Bind next turn
  · Inflict 2 Burn

dataList.name: Threefold Afterimage Entanglement
dataList.desc:
Stage 3 Afterimage Entanglement
- On Hit, activate the following effects:
  · Inflict 2 Bleed
  · Inflict 1 Bind next turn
  · Inflict 2 Burn

dataList.name: Twofold Afterimage Entanglement
dataList.desc:
Stage 2 Afterimage Entanglement
- On Hit, activate the following effects:
  · Inflict 1 Bind next turn
  · Inflict 2 Burn

dataList.name: Onefold Afterimage Entanglement
dataList.desc:
Stage 1 Afterimage Entanglement
- On Hit, activate the following effects:
  · Inflict 2 Burn

dataList.name: Shin (心) - Dihui Star
dataList.desc:
- Max Stack: 3
- Turn Start: Apply the following effects
· Gain 5 Poise Potency and +1 Poise Count for every Stack
· Gain 1 Slash DMG Up for every 15% missing HP on self (max 5)

dataList.name: Twisted and Disjointed Memory and Recollection
dataList.desc:
- Skill Slot +1
- Deal +20% damage to and take +20% damage from The Pinky Nursefather; On Clash Win, deal 5 SP damage to The Pinky Nursefather
- When taking damage that would Stagger this unit, does not get Staggered and remove the corresponding Stagger Threshold; then, gain 1 Attack Power Up next turn (once per turn)
- For this Encounter: After using a Skill, gain 1 E.G.O resource of the Skill's Affinity and 1 E.G.O resource for the least-owned E.G.O resource (2 times per turn)
- Cannot Retreat
dataList.summary: If there is a surviving ally, HP does not drop below 1

dataList.name: Mutilated Memory
dataList.desc:
- Skill Slot +1
- Deal +10% damage to The House of Spiders enemies
- When Staggered, immediately recover from Stagger at the start of the next turn and gain 1 Attack Power Up (once per Encounter)

dataList.name: Mutilated Memory and Recollection
dataList.desc:
- Skill Slot +1
- Deal +10% damage to The House of Spiders enemies
- When taking damage that would Stagger this unit, does not get Staggered and remove the corresponding Stagger Threshold; then, gain 1 Attack Power Up next turn (once per turn)
- For this Encounter: After using a Skill, gain 1 E.G.O resource of the Skill's Affinity and 1 E.G.O resource for the least-owned E.G.O resource (2 times per turn)
- Cannot Retreat

dataList.name: Malkuth's Reign - Imperfect Manifestation
dataList.desc: An imperfect glimpse of the power that shall reign over the Kingdom

dataList.desc:
Afterimages are Entangled
Effect Stage changes with the progress of combat pattern

dataList.name: Prescript: [Device] I
dataList.desc:
Use a Skill marked with Mark of the Prescript or hit a target with a marked Skill.

- Turn Start: Gain this effect when this unit has no Unlock
- Maximum stackable Grace of the Prescript with this Prescript is limited to 3
dataList.flavor: The Prescripts are delivered by many means, their medium determined with finality akin to divine prophecy. Those who receive them hold no power over how they arrive.

dataList.name: Prescript: [Device] II

- Turn Start: Gain this effect if this unit has Unlock - I
- Maximum stackable Grace of the Prescript with this Prescript is limited to 6
dataList.flavor: The Prescripts are delivered by many means, their medium determined with finality akin to divine prophecy. Those who receive them hold no power over how they arrive.

dataList.name: Prescript: [Device] III
dataList.desc:
Hit a target with E.G.O Awakening Skill, or, in Effloresced E.G.O::Procuration state, 'Skill 3' marked with Mark of the Prescript.

dataList.flavor: The Prescripts are delivered by many means, their medium determined with finality akin to divine prophecy. Those who receive them hold no power over how they arrive.

- Turn Start: Gain this effect if this unit has Unlock - III
dataList.flavor: The Prescripts are delivered by many means, their medium determined with finality akin to divine prophecy. Those who receive them hold no power over how they arrive.

dataList.name: Unlock
dataList.desc:
- Gain this effect when over certain Grace of the Prescript Stack
- Effect stage increases based on Grace of the Prescript Stack
- Max: Stage 3

dataList.name: Faith Beyond Question
dataList.desc:
- Min & Max Speed +1

- Gain 1 more Poise Potency from Base Skills
- This unit's SP does not drop below -15 from SP loss effects on this unit's Base Attack Skills
- Max Stack: 1

dataList.name: Shin (心) - Procuration
dataList.desc:
- Min & Max Speed +2
- Offense Level +1, Defense Level +1
- Gain 1 more Poise Potency and Poise Count from Base Skills
- Deal +(missing HP percentage / 2)% damage with Base Skills (max 40%)
- Max Stack: 1
